name: Jianhua Feng
content: Jianhua Feng Professor Database Group, Department of Computer Science and Technology, Tsinghua University Personal Education: Doctor of Computer Science & Technology, Tsinghua University, (2001-2006) Master of Computer Science & Technology, Tsinghua University, (1991-1993) Bachelor of Computer Science & Technology, Tsinghua University, (1986-1991) Employment Record: 1993 - 	Tsinghua University, Beijing, China	Teaching Faculty Member, Professor Mar. 1996 ¨C Oct. 1997	IAEA (International Atomic Energy Agent), Vienna, Austria	Technical Consultant Research Interests: Database, Data Warehouse, Database Security, XML Database, and Information Processing in WWW. Courses: Database System Introduction (for undergraduates) Database Special Training (for undergraduates) Publications Selected Publications (My DBLP Entry More Publications) Jianhua Feng, Guoliang Li, Jianyong Wang, Lizhu Zhou. Finding and ranking compact connected trees for effective keyword proximity search in XML documents. Accepted by Information Systems, (In Press), 2009. Guoliang Li, Chen Li, Jianhua Feng, Lizhu Zhou. SAIL: Structure-Aware Indexing for Effective and Progressive Top-k Keyword Search over XML Documents. Accepted by Information Sciences, (In Press), 2009. Guoliang Li, Shengyue Ji, Chen Li, Jianhua Feng. Efficient Type-Ahead Search on Relational Data: a TASTIER Approach.SIGMOD 2009. Shengyue Ji, Guoliang Li, Chen Li, Jianhua Feng. Effecive Fuzzy Interactive Search. WWW 2009. Guoliang Li, Jianhua Feng, Lizhu Zhou. Interactive Search in XML Data. WWW 2009 (poster). Guoliang Li, Jianhua Feng, Jianyong Wang, Lizhu Zhou. Incremental Sequence-Based Frequent Query Pattern Mining from XML Queries. Accepted to appear in Int. J. Data Mining and Knowledge Discovery. (DMKD, Springer Science). Guoliang Li, Xiaofang Zhou, Jianhua Feng, Jianyong Wang. Progressive Top-k Keyword Search in Relational Database. Accepted by ICDE 2009, April 2009, Shanghia, China. Guoliang Li, Jianhua Feng, Beng Chin Ooi, Jianyong Wang, and Lizhu Zhou. An effective 3-in-1 keyword search method over heterogeneous data sources. Accepted by Information Systems, (In Press), 2009 (Invited from SIGMOD08 paper). Guoliang Li, Beng Chin Ooi, Jianhua Feng, Jianyong Wang, Lizhu Zhou: EASE: an effective 3-in-1 keyword search method for unstructured, semi-structured and structured data. SIGMOD Conference 2008: 903-914 Guoliang Li, Jianhua Feng, Jianyong Wang, Lizhu Zhou: An effective and versatile keyword search engine on heterogenous data sources. PVLDB 1(2): 1452-1455 (2008) Guoliang Li, Jianhua Feng, Jianyong Wang, Lizhu Zhou: Effective keyword search for valuable lcas over xml documents. CIKM 2007: 31-40 Charu C. Aggarwal, Na Ta, Jianyong Wang, Jianhua Feng, Mohammed Javeed Zaki: Xproj: a framework for projected structural clustering of xml documents. KDD 2007: 46-55 Yi Wang, Shi-Xia Liu, Jianhua Feng, Lizhu Zhou: Mining Naturally Smooth Evolution of Clusters from Dynamic Data. SDM 2007 Yi Wang, Lizhu Zhou, Jianhua Feng, Jianyong Wang, Zhi-Qiang Liu: Mining Complex Time-Series Data by Learning Markovian Models. ICDM 2006: 1136-1140 Guoliang Li, Jianhua Feng, Jianyong Wang, Yong Zhang, Lizhu Zhou: Incremental Mining of Frequent Query Patterns from XML Queries for Caching.
